title: add graphics-debug package, and then update core and eval
description: Adds the graphics-debug package and updates the versions of core and eval packages in the project.

title: added schematic_table_cell as a separate element
description: Defines a new element, SchematicTableCell, for structured data representation within schematic tables.

title: rename schematic table rows to cells
description: Renames the rows property to cells in the schematic table data structure to improve clarity and consistency in the codebase.

title: feat: Add schematic_table element
description: Adds a new schematic_table element to the circuit-json specification, enabling structured data display in schematics.
body:
This pull request introduces a new schematic_table element to the circuit-json specification. This element allows for the        
creation of tables within schematics, which can be used for displaying structured data like bills of materials, pinouts, or other notes.      

The implementation includes:                                                                                                                  

 • A new schematic_table.ts file defining the SchematicTable interface and its corresponding Zod schema.                                      
 • The SchematicTableCell interface and schema for individual cells.                                                                          
 • Integration of the new element into any_circuit_element.                                                                                   
 • A basic test case to validate parsing of the schematic_table element. 

Sparkfun reference:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a16d53f8-4616-4e78-91d8-c31ab3441c23)
